== Main Inclusion Report for colorblind ==

=== Background ===

Library for providing colour filters in gnome-mag, intended for colourblind users. gnome-mag now needs it to build. See filters in action <nowiki>[[http://www.gnome.org/~carlosd/colorblind.mpeg|here]]</nowiki>.

=== Requirements ===

# ''Availability:'' in universe: https://beta.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/colorblind, builds on all architectures
# ''Rationale:''
** Colour filter support is becoming a part of upstream gnome-mag 
 0. ''Security:''
** No <nowiki>[[http://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvekey.cgi?keyword=colorblind|CVE entries]]</nowiki>.
** No <nowiki>[[http://secunia.com/search/?search=colorblind|Secunia history]]</nowiki>.
** No binaries running as root or suid/sgid.
 0. ''Quality assurance:''
** Active <nowiki>[[http://live.gnome.org/GnomeMag|upstream]]</nowiki>.
** Bugs: Currently <nowiki>[[https://bugs.beta.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/colorblind/|no bus in LP]]</nowiki>. gnome-mag itself also has <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/gnome-mag/+bugs|0 bugs in LP]]</nowiki>, about <nowiki>[[http://bugzilla.gnome.org/buglist.cgi?query=product%3Agnome-mag|15 upstream]]</nowiki>.
 0. ''Dependencies:''
** libc6, in Main
 0. ''Recommends:''
** none

=== Reviewers ===
